short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyword search volume, CPC, competition, and insights are provided for all keywords you search on Google search, all for free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Keyword Extension is a powerful tool for SEO enthusiasts and marketers, designed to enhance your keyword research process. With this extension, you can effortlessly uncover related keywords directly within your search engine results page (SERP).

Key features include:

Related Keywords: Instantly access a list of related keywords relevant to your search query, providing valuable insights into potential keyword opportunities.

Keyword Metrics: View essential metrics for each keyword, such as search volume, CPC (cost per click), and keyword trend over the year.

Export to CSV: Export keyword data to a CSV file for further analysis or integration into your SEO tools and reports.

Supported search engines include Google and Bing.
